title: Beautiful, Prime Location 1B x 1B Apt. Available Now! Come Tour!
map_address: 3909 San Fernando Rd near Central Ave
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to The Link Apartment Homes', 'Life changes, let The Link redefine yours!', 'Located in Glendale, CA, our brand-new community combines Southern California’s vibrant lifestyle with the glamour we all desire.', 'When it comes to making the most of the Glendale area, you can’t beat The Link’s location within walking distance of Metrolink for easy weekend getaways and everyday commutes.', 'Plus, our mixed-use community brings convenient shops to the ground floor.', 'Live a life that connects you to the things that make Glendale great.', 'Live at The Link.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 61', 'OR Text', '61', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 674 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Stainless Steel Appliance Package includes Refrigerator, Gas Range Stove, Dishwasher, and Built in Microwave', '- Balcony and Patios', '- In Unit Washer and Dryer', '- Central AC & Heating with Nest Controlled Thermostat', '- High Ceilings', '- Ceiling Fan', '- Extra Storage', '- Modern and Sleek Interiors', 'Community Amenities', '- Assigned Parking', '- Virtual Entryway Intercom System', '- Keyless Entryway', '- Heated Swimming Pool plus Spa', '- Pet Park with Wash Station', '- Controlled Gated Community', '- Two Story State of the Art Fitness Center', '- Resident Lounge Area', '- Package Lockers', '- Bike Storage Area', '- Outdoor Billiards Table & Ping Pong Table', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Limit - 2', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Monthly Pet Rent: $50 per pet', '$300 Pet Deposit per pet', 'Income Requirements:', '2 x the amount of rent.', '*Essential Housing Program, Income Restrictions Apply to Select Units', 'Driving Directions', 'From 210 West & 134 West, continue on to the CA- 2 South (Glendale Freeway) to Exit on San Fernando Road.', 'Make a right off the freeway, The Link is on the left hand side.', 'From the 110 West/ 5 South Freeway, continue on until Exit Glendale Blvd, turn right on Glendale Blvd, turn Left on San Fernando Road, The Link is on the left hand side.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Sunday: 12:00PM-6:00PM', 'The Link', '3909 San Fernando Rd, Glendale, CA, 91204', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', '90rwIV97']
